runs.comm: starts off nice and straight and tucks him up for room, he punches it to the off side
a confident whip over the on side, goes across the stumps and whips him over midwicket, there's a deep square leg who cuts it off
angles across him and he punches it to the off side
he takes the risk of moving right across his stumps to sweep, landed a shade outside leg and it struck his pads and then rolled to fine leg, the fielder chased in vain, good decision by the umpire
goes back and works it to the on side
this time he gives him width outside off and Masakadza cuts hard but straight to backward point
this was sliding down the leg side and Sarfraz thought he had gloved it, the umpire wasn't so sure
he chips down the track looking to bash that way and he misses it completely
stays back and tucks him down to midwicket
good length just outside off and Masakadza can only punch it  back to the bowler
he gives him width outside the off stump and he gets an outside edge to third man
nice tight stuff from Asad, cramped him for room and he could only punch it back to the bowler
drifts on the pads and the ball lobs off his pads and drops towards short midwicket
this was sliding down the leg side and the keeper fumbled, they steal a run too
cracked that! Masakadza made room early and it was a touch too short, the length was good enough for him to bash it over cover
stays beside the line and steers it well wide of backward point
angles across him and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
he gets forward and across and drops it towards point and heads back to his crease
Asad strays too wide down the leg side, dangerous ploy given the fine leg is up
Sibanda comes down the track but can only chop it straight to cover
he drops it a bit short and he swivels and pulls him down to deep square leg
finds the gap this time, this was dropped short of a length, read the length early and clubbed it wide of the deep square leg fielder
he oversteps, tight call, Sibanda went down the track but missed
Free Hit - oh well this was too wide outside the off stump
Free Hit part 2 - Makes good use of it this time, this was too full on the off stump and he thrashes it along the turf wide of mid-off
full outside off and he gets an inside edge to the boot on the drive
he opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
poor start by Anwar, low full toss down the leg side, the fine leg was up, Sibanda easily runs it down to fine leg, to the square boundary
better delivery, just outside off and he has time to run it down to third man
this was short and wide and punched firmly but the alert and agile Shehzad's there at backward point to cut it off, good stuff
Anwar doesn't give him room and the batsman just pushes it down the track
Masakadza states his intent by coming down the track, unsettles Anwar and clubs a length delivery in the gap at midwicket
unconventional! Masakadza improvises with the sweep, fine leg is up, he moves across and paddles it wide of the keeper
comes forward and softly pushes it to the off side
pushes this quicker and flatter and defended again
goes back at the crease and punches it down the track
flatter and on the pads and the ball clips the pads and rolls away
flatter and he stays back and defends
tight over, a maiden, cramps him for room and he can only defend
stays back at the crease and he punches it down the track
gets forward and he pushes it down to deep point
stays back and he punches it down to long-off
drifts on the pads and he nudges it to the leg side
he goes back and he steers it to short third man
flatter one on the pads and he chips it in the air to wide long-on
flatter one and pushed towards short fine leg, Tanvir hits the stumps direct at the batsman's end but he's home
clips it towards midwicket
stays back and punches it straight to short midwicket
the dot-ball pressure gets to Sibanda! He goes forward and bends to slog that away, gets a top edge and Tanvir runs from short fine leg and takes the catch in the region of short square leg
punches it back to the bowler
goes back and punches it down the track, that's a wicket maiden
comes forward and drives him down to mid-off
little shorter and he punches it wide of backward point
flatter delivery and he works it wide of midwicket
tossed it a bit slower and he chipped it in the air down to long-on
attempts the reverse sweeps, doesn't come off well and it runs off the arm to short third man
clips it towards midwicket and mid-on for a single
he makes room early and flat-bats it to long-on, a run off Hafeez at last
very soft dismissal, Taylor seemed intent on playing the reverse sweep, doesn't come off at all, the ball clips his glove and lobs up, Sarfraz runs forward and claims the catch
stays back and punches it to long-off

Amin saves a six! Spectacular effort, Masakadza slogged him on one knee, it was headed over the deep midwicket rope, Amin backpedals, catches it above his head, has the presence to throw the ball inside the boundary before falling backwards, replays showed that his foot was safe, super effort
good shot, tossed up on middle and Williams came forward and chipped it over midwicket and beats the long-on fielder
pushes it to the off side
flatter and quicker and he pushes it down to long-off
fired it quicker and he pushes it towards mid-off and sets off
quicker and he rocks back and punches it to cover
Zimbabwe need more of those! Afridi tossed it up this time, Masakadza was at the crease, bent forward and lofted it over long-off
6 + 4! Afridi bowls this one too full and wide outside off and he drives hard past cover, beats the sweeper in the deep
goes back and works it down to long-on
slower through the air and he punches it to long-on
all power! Hafeez gives it a bit more air, Williams is on his knee and meets it on the full toss, sweeps hard past deep square leg
gets forward and drives to the off side
strays too wide down leg and they take a run too
gets forward and bashes it straight to cover
he goes back and punches it down to mid-off
he goes back at the crease and works it down to square leg
comes well forward and drives towards cover
comes round the wicket, gives it more air and he chips down the track and lofts towards long-off
comes down the track and he works it towards long-on
tried the reverse sweep and the ball hit the body and nearly dribbled onto the stumps
gets forward and works it in the gap between midwicket and mid-on
comes round the wicket, flatter delivery and he works it hard down to long-on
caught in the deep! Hafeez bowls this one shorter, Masakadza stays back and pulls and the ball dips towards deep midwicket, Amin times his dive well and takes the catch
flatter delivery and he works it towards long-on
yet another close call for Williams on the reverse sweep, the ball lobs off his body and nearly rolls on the stump
goes a few rows back! Tossed up on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and slogs him over deep midwicket, clean strike
he comes forward and he is beaten and Sarfraz breaks the stumps and appeals for a stumping, Chigumbura just managed to drag his back foot back, the third umpire takes a look
drops it a fraction short and he goes back and thumps it wide of cover and he finds the gap
pushes it down to long-off

Williams stretches his luck too far with the reverse sweep! Babar tossed it up from round the wicket, Williams went down the track and attempted to reverse sweep it, beaten Sarfraz broke the stumps, Williams lost his balance and he was short of the crease
sharp catch by Hafeez! Tossed up outside off and he chipped down the track and drove it towards short extra cover, it went quickly and Hafeez plucked it falling to his right
punches it towards cover and risks a single to Afridi who fires at the bowler's stumps and misses
comes forward and punches it hard towards Afridi again
little short and wide and he cuts him hard but straight to backward point
this was fuller outside off and Waller made himself some room to smash it through the off side, he's beaten
he tries the short one and he strays down the leg side, wide called
Asad bowls the wrong line, a bit too straight, Waller bends and pulls him wide of square leg and finds the gap at long leg
these boundaries should pep up Zimbabwe, full and wide outside off and driven hard through the covers, finds the gap at deep cover
wrong length! Dropped it too short,  Chigumbura rocked back and clubbed it several rows over deep midwicket, they've lost the ball and they need a replacement
tossed up outside off and he makes room and chips it towards point
good running! He pushes it through the big gap at cover, takes the first one hard and he puts pressure on the fielder
tries to sweep and the ball clips the pad and rolls away
flatter one and drifting down leg, tries to pull but the ball clips the pad and rolls way, a stifled appeal
goes back and he punches him down to cover
Tanvir comes round the wicket, short and pulled to deep midwicket, the message is to throw to the keeper's end but the fielder fires it to the bowler instead
he makes room and scoops it over point for a couple
down the leg side and he tries to pull it fine but the ball clips his body but rolls away
this was a bouncer and Waller gets a top edge as he looks to pull, lands safely at mid-off, umpire signals the one bouncer for the over
drifting on the body and he works it towards long-on
makes room and works it away down to long-on
waller makes room and tries to smash it over the off side, misses it completely
connects this time! This was a length ball, Waller made room and swung his bat, lands on the grass banks over wide long-on
slower ball and Waller makes room and scoops it over cover, the sweeper picks it up

can't get it past Afridi at long-on! Looked like the slower ball, fuller on middle and leg, Waller tried the same shot that fetched him a six earlier in the over, didn't get the distance, Afridi hangs on well in front of the rope
low full toss and he scoops it over the bowler, Shehzad does really well to run to his right from long-on and slide and save a boundary, hurt his shoulder too
low full toss again and he swings it towards long-on
Zimbabwe need four more of those! Slower ball from round the wicket, picked off a good length and swung over deep midwicket
swing and a miss, he made room swung too early
swings it towards the body and he tries to force it to the leg side but the ball hits him on the body
shorter delivery and Chigumbura pulls it to deep square leg, this won't do for Zimbabwe
you can't put that away for six, yorker on middle and off and he can only jam it out
makes room to smash it over the off side and he misses it completely, game over
